name: Stories from the Book of Metal
description: Zephaniah’s first full-length album. 55 minutes of pure, epic metal! Comparable to Dragonforce, Hammerfall, Cacophony. Available now! Track Listing: 1. The Metal Prayer 2. Antietam 3. Avenger of Souls 4. Deep Breath 5. Sword of the King 6. Fight for Love 7. Blackbeard’s Revenge 8. The Lone Warrior 9. Flame of the Dragon Free shipping for single CD orders! Quantity discounts now available! Visit our website for more information: www.zephaniahmetal.com
